title: 'Not recommended'
body: 'I would not recommend this product for daily use as it tends to dry out the hair causing damage. Initially after a shower it does leave your hair feeling soft and fluffy but over time it can lead to breakage and damage.'

title: 'Receive half empty bottle'
body: 'I received the product half empty bottle where as I have paid for whole 400ml'

title: 'For daily use'
body: 'Very nice shampoo.must buy it.it works for daily basis.it don-t spit the hair even if you use it daily.camical free product .must go for gentle wash.'

title: 'Good'
body: 'But more chemicals in the ahampoo based on your condition you can use. Long lasting smell no dandruff. Better to use'

title: 'Discrepancy in details'
body: 'When we search the product it shows 700 ml on the main search page. The cost calculated per 100 ml is also based on 700 ml. However the actual product contains 650 ml shampoo only. This can be seen only after we click and move ahead to open the page of the said product. This can easily be missed and I feel this is mis leading. You should immediately rectify this discrepancy.'

title: 'Good shampoo'
body: 'A good cleanser but not recommended for dandruff hairs'

title: 'Waste shampoo'
body: Don't buy this shampoo at any cost it makes your hair rough to the core also makes damage and hair fall.

title: Don't foolish your customer
body: Please don't give wrong info while selecting a product. Actually it is 340 ml, and that's okay. But you give like 400 ml. In the heading you give like 340 ml, but that is not noticeable. I am giving 3 star for the product only, not for the dealer. Actually the product is amazing and it should get 5 star.

But after using This shampoo, I tell you m so relieved that that storm is now Gone n my hairs behaves calmly.
